description:
Jacob is 23 years old. He works for a major delivery service. I won't say which one, but if you've seen a brown truck with a hot guy driving it you'll know what I mean.
He's got a couple of scrapes on his knuckles.
"How did that happen?" I asked.
"I was carrying some boxes up some stairs. One of them slipped and I banged by hand against the wall."
He decided he wanted to do a video because a friend of his did one and said he had fun.
"I'd like to move on to something bigger and better though," he said.
"What do you mean?"
"You know, more than just a solo," he said.
Hmmm... that's a thread I'm definitely going to pull!
Jacob is really shy and fun to embarrass because he's a good sport and he gets the cutest smile on his face.
We were trying to get him to admit that he's got a nice, big cock, so we asked him what his best feature is.
First he said his arms, then his legs, and finally we coaxed it out of him.
"My cock," he said with a shy smile. "I guess it's kind of big."
title: Jacob
